text: Hey team, I'm running into a bit of a wall with smart content limit of 20 (20 Variants per module). So wanted to look into other ways of bringing content (copy text/images) into modules though other means, using hubl to look at a DAM system maybe. Has anyone else looked into this area before?
If you had lists running in the hundreds of thousands or even millions, what would the overhead on the server side look like?
